item.title: Live updates: Judge gives Trump 'unconditional discharge' to respect presidency
item.description: Get updates on the sentencing of President-elect Donald Trump in his criminal hush money case in New York.

item.title: Supreme Court weighs fate of TikTok days before ban on app to take effect
item.description: The Supreme Court will decide the fate of TikTok in the U.S. as a federal ban on foreign-adversary owned apps is set to take effect Jan. 19.
